title: Matewan
creator_credit: John Sayles, Maggie Renzi, Peggy Rajski, Red Dog Films and Goldcrest
brief_description: A realistic account of the fierce struggle that raged in the coalfields of West Virginia in the 1920’s between coalminers, fighting for trade-union rights, and mine-owners who employed gangster methods to maintain crippling conditions and pay. Features photography by Haskell Wexler.
